about_the_game:
Add this VR ride cymbal designed to work in VR Drums Ultimate Streamer to your collection. Once purchased, you can use the instrument in the game, spawn as many as you like, and place them anywhere you wish.

Pitch: Low
Type: Ride
Construction: Bronze/B20
Weight: 3.8 lbs.
Style: Jazz
Sound: Dark/Washy/Trashy
Response: 9/10

Summary
Personally like this one, with a clean almost ancient looking deep bronze look. A mix between a royal and primitive tribal sound. A dark, dynamic wash and a touch of trashy undertones.
